readable.title: 2585141045_b496a7b7c4
readable.content: A little boy blows bubbles , which are held by a young woman A little boy with brown curly hair is blowing bubbles with a wand held by a girl . A small boy blows bubbles through a wand held by his mother . A woman holding a bubble wand for the child to blow bubbles from . A woman holds a bubble wand while a toddler blows bubbles .
